index.html.summary: BOOSE Interpreter – Documentation Welcome to the official documentation for BOOSE Interpreter by Bivek Kumar Sah (77466871). 📘 API Documentation View the full API reference generated from XML comments: 👉 API Reference 🚀 Project Overview This interpreter supports: Moveto, Drawto, Circle, Rect Pen Colour Custom Commands (tri, etc.) Variables (int, real, array) Control Flow: if, while, for Methods Full XML documentation DocFX website generation Design Patterns: Factory, Singleton Unit Testing 📂 Source Code All source code is available here: 👉 https://github.com/Sbivek22/BOOSE_Bivek_77466871
